sect2.title: Flip & Rotate (0°)
sect2.para:
You can access this submenu from the menu:
View Flip & Rotate (0°) ,
These commands change the view only, not on the image itself. If you want to change the image, go to: menuImage - Transform.

sect3.title: Reset Flip & Rotate
sect3.para: This command restores the view of the image to its original state.

listitem.para:
From the menu:
View Flip & Rotate (0°) Reset Flip & Rotate .

sect3.title: Flip Horizontally and Flip Vertically
sect3.para: These commands change the view by flipping the image horizontally or vertically. If one of these is enabled you will see a check mark in front of the command.

sect3.title: Rotate 15° clockwise
sect3.para: This command rotates the view of the image 15° clockwise.

listitem.para:
From the menu:
View Flip & Rotate (0°) Rotate 15° clockwise .

sect3.title: Rotate 15° counter-clockwise
sect3.para: This command rotates the view of the image 15° counter-clockwise.

listitem.para:
From the menu:
View Flip & Rotate (0°) Rotate 15° counter-clockwise .

sect3.title: Rotate 90° clockwise
sect3.para: This command rotates the view of the image 90° clockwise.

listitem.para:
From the menu:
View Flip & Rotate (0°) Rotate 90° clockwise .

sect3.title: Rotate 90° counter-clockwise
sect3.para: This command rotates the view of the image 90° counter-clockwise.

listitem.para:
From the menu:
View Flip & Rotate (0°) Rotate 90° counter-clockwise .

sect3.title: Rotate 180°
sect3.para: This command rotates the view of the image 180°.

listitem.para:
From the menu:
View Flip & Rotate (0°) Rotate 180° .

sect3.title: Other rotation angle…
sect3.para: This command opens a dialog that allows you to set the exact angle of rotation for the view. You can set the angle in the numeric input field, or drag the pointer in the circle to the desired angle.

listitem.para:
From the menu:
View Flip & Rotate (0°) Other rotation angle… .
